name: Into the Slumber
description:
You've lost your tool on the sewer, now you need to get them back.

Into the Sumbler is a physics based platform game.

Controls:
- Use WASD or ARROWS to move and jump.
- Use SPACE or E to get heavy.
- Use R to restart the level.

Team:
Game Design: Fernanda Batista
Coding: Givago Fritzen
Art: Vinícius Pereira

Audio: Freesounds.com

A LudumDare 40 gamejam.
